original: intros H1 H2. apply (Derive_n_ext_loc (fun y : R => f y + g y) (fun y : R => Derive_n f n y + Derive_n g n y) n x). - intros y H3 k H4. rewrite (Derive_n_ext (fun z : R => f z + g z) (fun z : R => Derive_n f n z + Derive_n g n z) n y). + apply H1. apply H4. + intros z. ring. - intros y H3 k H4. rewrite Derive_n_comp. ring.
